column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We came for dinner and waited an hour to get a table
column2: a sign of a good restaurant. The deep dish
column4: sausage pizza was soooooo good. I love pizza and that one knocked my socks off. My husband shared the pizza dip appetizer with another guy and that seemed to be nothing great
column5: but their house salad was a great no-frills dose of veggies. Our server forgot our drinks
column6: but once we reminded him he was right on top of it. We left in a pretty large food coma
column7: but it was well worth it.
